mapper.update: update l_video set videoid=videoid ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,videoname=#{videoname} ,ip=#{ip} ,serviceport=#{serviceport} ,httpport=#{httpport} ,rtspport=#{rtspport} ,username=#{username} ,password=#{password} ,channel=#{channel} ,place=#{place} ,position_x=#{position_x} ,position_y=#{position_y} ,videotype=#{videotype} ,connecttype=#{connecttype} ,datasignal=#{datasignal} ,isonline=#{isonline} ,facid=#{facid} ,isshouchu=#{isshouchu} ,isshibie=#{isshibie} ,sequno=#{sequno} ,oxcver=#{oxcver} ,maliu=#{maliu} ,uuid=#{uuid} where videoid=#{videoid}

update l_video set videoid=videoid ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,videoname=#{videoname} ,ip=#{ip} ,serviceport=#{serviceport} ,httpport=#{httpport} ,rtspport=#{rtspport} ,username=#{username} ,password=#{password} ,channel=#{channel} ,place=#{place} ,position_x=#{position_x} ,position_y=#{position_y} ,videotype=#{videotype} ,connecttype=#{connecttype} ,datasignal=#{datasignal} ,isonline=#{isonline} ,facid=#{facid} ,isshouchu=#{isshouchu} ,isshibie=#{isshibie} ,sequno=#{sequno} ,oxcver=#{oxcver} ,maliu=#{maliu} ,uuid=#{uuid} where 1=1 and videoid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and videoid =#{Where_Id} and videoid=#{Where_videoid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and videoname=#{Where_videoname} and ip=#{Where_ip} and serviceport=#{Where_serviceport} and httpport=#{Where_httpport} and rtspport=#{Where_rtspport} and username=#{Where_username} and password=#{Where_password} and channel=#{Where_channel} and place=#{Where_place} and position_x=#{Where_position_x} and position_y=#{Where_position_y} and videotype=#{Where_videotype} and connecttype=#{Where_connecttype} and datasignal=#{Where_datasignal} and isonline=#{Where_isonline} and facid=#{Where_facid} and isshouchu=#{Where_isshouchu} and isshibie=#{Where_isshibie} and sequno=#{Where_sequno} and oxcver=#{Where_oxcver} and maliu=#{Where_maliu} and uuid=#{Where_uuid}
mapper.select: select t.videoid "videoid", t.groupid "groupid", g.groupname "groupname", t.companyid "companyid", c.companyname "companyname", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", gd.graindepotname "graindepotname", t.storageid "storageid", s.storagename "storagename", t.videoname "videoname", t.ip "ip", t.serviceport "serviceport", t.httpport "httpport", t.rtspport "rtspport", t.username "username", t.password "password", t.channel "channel", t.place "place", t.position_x "position_x", t.position_y "position_y", t.videotype "videotype", t.connecttype "connecttype", t.datasignal "datasignal", t.isonline "isonline", t.facid "facid", t.isshouchu "isshouchu", t.isshibie "isshibie", t.sequno "sequno", t.oxcver "oxcver", t.maliu "maliu", t.uuid "uuid" from l_video t left join l_group g on t.groupid=g.groupid left join l_company c on t.companyid=c.companyid left join l_graindepot gd on t.graindepotid=gd.graindepotid left join l_storage s on t.storageid=s.storageid where videoid=#{videoid}

select t.videoid "videoid", t.groupid "groupid", g.groupname "groupname", t.companyid "companyid", c.companyname "companyname", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", gd.graindepotname "graindepotname", t.storageid "storageid", s.storagename "storagename", t.videoname "videoname", t.ip "ip", t.serviceport "serviceport", t.httpport "httpport", t.rtspport "rtspport", t.username "username", t.password "password", t.channel "channel", t.place "place", t.position_x "position_x", t.position_y "position_y", t.videotype "videotype", t.connecttype "connecttype", t.datasignal "datasignal", t.isonline "isonline", t.facid "facid", t.isshouchu "isshouchu", t.isshibie "isshibie", t.sequno "sequno", t.oxcver "oxcver", t.maliu "maliu", t.uuid "uuid" from l_video t left join l_group g on t.groupid=g.groupid left join l_company c on t.companyid=c.companyid left join l_graindepot gd on t.graindepotid=gd.graindepotid left join l_storage s on t.storageid=s.storageid where 1=1 and t.videoid=#{videoid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.videoname=#{videoname} and t.ip=#{ip} and t.serviceport=#{serviceport} and t.httpport=#{httpport} and t.rtspport=#{rtspport} and t.username=#{username} and t.password=#{password} and t.channel=#{channel} and t.place=#{place} and t.position_x=#{position_x} and t.position_y=#{position_y} and t.videotype=#{videotype} and t.connecttype=#{connecttype} and t.datasignal=#{datasignal} and t.isonline=#{isonline} and t.facid=#{facid} and t.isshouchu=#{isshouchu} and t.isshibie=#{isshibie} and t.sequno=#{sequno} and t.oxcver=#{oxcver} and t.maliu=#{maliu} and t.uuid=#{uuid}

select t.videoid "videoid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.videoname "videoname", t.ip "ip", t.serviceport "serviceport", t.httpport "httpport", t.rtspport "rtspport", t.username "username", t.password "password", t.channel "channel", t.place "place", t.position_x "position_x", t.position_y "position_y", t.videotype "videotype", t.connecttype "connecttype", t.datasignal "datasignal", t.isonline "isonline", t.facid "facid", t.isshouchu "isshouchu", t.isshibie "isshibie", t.sequno "sequno", t.oxcver "oxcver", t.maliu "maliu", t.uuid "uuid" from l_video t where 1=1 and t.videoid=#{videoid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.videoname=#{videoname} and t.ip=#{ip} and t.serviceport=#{serviceport} and t.httpport=#{httpport} and t.rtspport=#{rtspport} and t.username=#{username} and t.password=#{password} and t.channel=#{channel} and t.place=#{place} and t.position_x=#{position_x} and t.position_y=#{position_y} and t.videotype=#{videotype} and t.connecttype=#{connecttype} and t.datasignal=#{datasignal} and t.isonline=#{isonline} and t.facid=#{facid} and t.isshouchu=#{isshouchu} and t.isshibie=#{isshibie} and t.sequno=#{sequno} and t.oxcver=#{oxcver} and t.maliu=#{maliu} and t.uuid=#{uuid}
mapper.delete: delete from l_video where 1=1 and videoid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and videoid =#{Where_Id} and videoid=#{Where_videoid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and videoname=#{Where_videoname} and ip=#{Where_ip} and serviceport=#{Where_serviceport} and httpport=#{Where_httpport} and rtspport=#{Where_rtspport} and username=#{Where_username} and password=#{Where_password} and channel=#{Where_channel} and place=#{Where_place} and position_x=#{Where_position_x} and position_y=#{Where_position_y} and videotype=#{Where_videotype} and connecttype=#{Where_connecttype} and datasignal=#{Where_datasignal} and isonline=#{Where_isonline} and facid=#{Where_facid} and isshouchu=#{Where_isshouchu} and isshibie=#{Where_isshibie} and sequno=#{Where_sequno} and oxcver=#{Where_oxcver} and maliu=#{Where_maliu} and uuid=#{Where_uuid}
mapper.select: select t.videoid "videoid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", gd.graindepotname "graindepotname", t.storageid "storageid", t.videoname "videoname", t.ip "ip", t.serviceport "serviceport", t.httpport "httpport", t.rtspport "rtspport", t.username "username", t.password "password", t.channel "channel", t.place "place", t.position_x "position_x", t.position_y "position_y", t.videotype "videotype", t.connecttype "connecttype", t.datasignal "datasignal", t.isonline "isonline", t.facid "facid", t.isshouchu "isshouchu", t.isshibie "isshibie", t.sequno "sequno", t.oxcver "oxcver", t.maliu "maliu", t.uuid "uuid" from l_video t left join l_graindepot gd on t.graindepotid=gd.graindepotid where 1=1 and t.videoid=#{videoid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.videoname like #{videoname} and t.ip=#{ip} and t.serviceport=#{serviceport} and t.httpport=#{httpport} and t.rtspport=#{rtspport} and t.username=#{username} and t.password=#{password} and t.channel=#{channel} and t.place=#{place} and t.position_x=#{position_x} and t.position_y=#{position_y} and t.videotype=#{videotype} and t.connecttype=#{connecttype} and t.datasignal=#{datasignal} and t.isonline=#{isonline} and t.facid=#{facid} and t.isshouchu=#{isshouchu} and t.isshibie=#{isshibie} and t.sequno=#{sequno} and t.oxcver=#{oxcver} and t.maliu=#{maliu} and t.uuid=#{uuid}

select count(*) from l_video t where 1=1 and t.videoid=#{videoid} and t.videoid!=#{NoId} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.videoname=#{videoname} and t.ip=#{ip} and t.serviceport=#{serviceport} and t.httpport=#{httpport} and t.rtspport=#{rtspport} and t.username=#{username} and t.password=#{password} and t.channel=#{channel} and t.place=#{place} and t.position_x=#{position_x} and t.position_y=#{position_y} and t.videotype=#{videotype} and t.connecttype=#{connecttype} and t.datasignal=#{datasignal} and t.isonline=#{isonline} and t.facid=#{facid} and t.isshouchu=#{isshouchu} and t.isshibie=#{isshibie} and t.sequno=#{sequno} and t.oxcver=#{oxcver} and t.maliu=#{maliu} and t.uuid=#{uuid}

select t.videoid "videoid", t.groupid "groupid", g.groupname "groupname", t.companyid "companyid", c.companyname "companyname", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", gd.graindepotname "graindepotname", t.storageid "storageid", s.storagename "storagename", t.videoname "videoname", t.ip "ip", t.serviceport "serviceport", t.httpport "httpport", t.rtspport "rtspport", t.username "username", t.password "password", t.channel "channel", t.place "place", t.position_x "position_x", t.position_y "position_y", t.videotype "videotype", t.connecttype "connecttype", t.datasignal "datasignal", t.isonline "isonline", t.facid "facid", t.isshouchu "isshouchu", t.isshibie "isshibie", t.sequno "sequno", t.oxcver "oxcver", t.maliu "maliu", t.uuid "uuid" from l_inout_video iv left join l_video t on iv.videoid=t.videoid left join l_group g on t.groupid=g.groupid left join l_company c on t.companyid=c.companyid left join l_graindepot gd on t.graindepotid=gd.graindepotid left join l_storage s on t.storageid=s.storageid where iv.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and iv.pos=1 order by iv.sequno limit 1

select t.videoid "videoid", t.groupid "groupid", g.groupname "groupname", t.companyid "companyid", c.companyname "companyname", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", gd.graindepotname "graindepotname", t.storageid "storageid", s.storagename "storagename", t.videoname "videoname", t.ip "ip", t.serviceport "serviceport", t.httpport "httpport", t.rtspport "rtspport", t.username "username", t.password "password", t.channel "channel", t.place "place", t.position_x "position_x", t.position_y "position_y", t.videotype "videotype", t.connecttype "connecttype", t.datasignal "datasignal", t.isonline "isonline", t.facid "facid", t.isshouchu "isshouchu", t.isshibie "isshibie", t.sequno "sequno", t.oxcver "oxcver", t.maliu "maliu", t.uuid "uuid" from l_inout_video iv left join l_video t on iv.videoid=t.videoid left join l_group g on t.groupid=g.groupid left join l_company c on t.companyid=c.companyid left join l_graindepot gd on t.graindepotid=gd.graindepotid left join l_storage s on t.storageid=s.storageid where iv.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and iv.pos=4 order by iv.sequno limit 4
